title: Request an article
test-server: This is a test server. Please expect things to break.
no-javascript: This form requires Javascript to work!  Please enable Javascript in your browser to continue.
error: There was an error processing your form input.  Please correct the errors highlighted below and re-submit
footer1: Article request tool &middot Written by Matthewrbowker
challengeMessage: This site requires a wikimedia account to be used.  Please click the button below to log into your account.
intro: If you would like to request an article to be created, please fill out the information below.  Fields with a star are required.
subject: Subject (topic) of the article :
username: Your Wikipedia username (if you have one) :
sources: Reliable Sources (please provide between two and six) :
check_1: The subject of this request is important enough for its own article, per Wikipedia's requirements.
check_2: This is not a duplicate of a prior request I have made.
about-content: Wikipedia article request tool written by Matthew Bowker and hosted on the Wikimedia Labs cluster. Please look on GitHub for the source code to the web interface and the bot.
about-bootstrap: Twitter Bootstrap licensed under the Apache Licence 2.0.
about-glyphicon: Glyphicons Free licensed under CC-BY-SA.
search-intro: This page allows you to search for requests.
success: The request has been successfully processed!  Thank you for your contribution to Wikipedia!
failure: We were unable to process the request.  Please go back and try again.
dev: Here is the data, for debugging purposes
